Title: AN ACT MAKING AN APPROPRIATION FOR THE EXTENSION OF THE WATER SUPPLY SYSTEM OF THE CITY OF BAGUIO, AND PROVIDING FOR THE DISPOSITION OF THE REVENUE RECEIVED FROM SAID SYSTEM.
Data:
[ Act No. 2189, September 17, 1912 ]
AN ACT MAKING AN APPROPRIATION FOR THE EXTENSION OF THE WATER SUPPLY SYSTEM OF THE CITY OF BAGUIO, AND PROVIDING FOR THE DISPOSITION OF THE REVENUE RECEIVED FROM SAID SYSTEM.
By authority of the United States, be it enacted by the Philippine Commission, that:
Section 1.(aw√ûhi( There is hereby appropriated, out of any funds in the Insular Treasury not otherwise appropriated, the sum of twelve thousand five hundred pesos, to be expended in the discretion of the Secretary of Commerce and Police in the extension of the water supply system of the city of Baguio.
All revenue of the water supply system of the city of Baguio on and after July first, nineteen hundred and twelve, shall be kept as a, separate fund to be expended by the Bureau of Public Works under the direction of the Secretary of Commerce and Police for the maintenance, improvement and extension of said system.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its passage.
Enacted, September 17, 1912.
